alec.is.awesome.spaceinvaders

Class ImageLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • alec.is.awesome.spaceinvaders.ImageLibrary

  • public class ImageLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that stores a copy of the image in RAM and allows all Entities of the same type to draw the same image. This takes up far less memory.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static android.util.SparseArray<android.graphics.Bitmap> images
      This stores all of the images that need to be used in the game.

      ImageLibrary()

      Gets an image based on the Android resource id

    • Field Detail

      • images

        private static android.util.SparseArray<android.graphics.Bitmap> images
        This stores all of the images that need to be used in the game. Sparse Arrays work but haveing indices that are not consecutive. This allows us to use the Android Resource id as a key, even though we don't know what it will be

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageLibrary

        public ImageLibrary()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Called by the main activity AFTER the resource loader has been initialized. Calling this before will result in an error

      • getImage

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap getImage(int resId)
        Gets an image based on the Android resource id
        Parameters:
        resId - The android resource id R.drawable.filename
        Returns:
        The bitmap image of the resource
